nlp_patient:
Severe diabetic retinal disease features are present. Urgent ophthalmology review is recommended to prevent

progression. Key systemic risk factors: smoking, hypertension, obesity (BMI≥30). Lesion coverage: ~7.74% of

image area (automated estimate). Detected lesion highlights: exudates (0.17%), hemorrhages (7.57%). Reported

model accuracy: 0.95. Urgent retina referral recommended; coordinate systemic optimization.
